snippet: The softball team of Dewey & LeBoeuf, the behemoth firm that went bankrupt this year, is 10-1 and is defending its league championship from last season.
abstract: Softball team of Dewey & LeBoeuf, massive Manhattan law firm that went bankrupt earlier this year, continues to take the field in the Lawyers Coed Softball League, defending its 2011 championship; firm's travails do not seem to be having an effect on the team, and in fact may have given them a competitive edge--they are 10-1 for the season. .
lead_paragraph: The softball team of Dewey & LeBoeuf, the behemoth firm that went bankrupt this year, is 10-1 and is defending its league championship from last season.

headline.seo: Dewey & LeBoeuf Keeps Its Troubles Off the Softball Field
headline.main: Defunct Law Firm Keeps Its Troubles Off the Softball Field
headline.print_headline: Defunct Law Firm Keeps Its Troubles Off the Softball Field
